body:
Officially leaving this open as a "Go2" feature request, as it has come up before.
It is not a suitable change for Go1.

--

On a personal note, I am not inspired by the examples in this proposal. In particular, the example showing returning an error is a classic example of [bad style](https://golang.org/doc/faq#nil_error) (you should always return `error` values, not values of concrete types that implement `error`). This weakens the proposal as a whole.
